title: "H5DataWriter"
subtitle: "Satellite receiving data and writing it to HDF5 files "
---

## Description

To start the Satellite, run

``` shell
SatelliteHDF5DataWriter
```

or

``` shell
SatelliteHDF5DataWriter --help
```

to get a list of the available command-line arguments.
